mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.intf_name AS "intfName", a.call_method AS "callMethod", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.caller AS "caller", a.callee AS "callee", a.req_time AS "reqTime", a.rsp_time AS "rspTime", a.req_msg AS "reqMsg", a.rsp_msg AS "rspMsg", a.call_status AS "callStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO park_intf_log( id, intf_name, call_method, order_id, caller, callee, req_time, rsp_time, req_msg, rsp_msg, call_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{intfName}, #{callMethod}, #{orderId}, #{caller}, #{callee}, #{reqTime}, #{rspTime}, #{reqMsg}, #{rspMsg}, #{callStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE park_intf_log SET intf_name = #{intfName}, call_method = #{callMethod}, order_id = #{orderId}, caller = #{caller}, callee = #{callee}, req_time = #{reqTime}, rsp_time = #{rspTime}, req_msg = #{reqMsg}, rsp_msg = #{rspMsg}, call_status = #{callStatus}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
